com.oosegroup19.memoize.layout

Class LocationBasedNotificationFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.oosegroup19.memoize.layout.BaseFragment
        • com.oosegroup19.memoize.layout.LocationBasedNotificationFragment

  • public class LocationBasedNotificationFragment
extends BaseFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass. Use the newInstance(java.lang.String, double, double) factory method to create an instance of this fragment. This fragment allows a user to create a LocationBasedNotification.

        public static LocationBasedNotificationFragment newInstance(java.lang.String loc,
                                                            double latitude,

        LocationBasedNotification constructor.
        Parameters:
        loc - The name of the location.

      • newInstance

        public static LocationBasedNotificationFragment newInstance(java.lang.String loc,
                                                            double latitude,
                                                            double longitude,
                                                            java.lang.String name,
                                                            java.lang.String description,
                                                            int radius)
        LocationBasedNotification constructor for returning from the drop pin or hopkins locations pages (so that the text fields are filled out and do not need to be re-filled).
        Parameters:
        loc - The name of the location.
        latitude - The latitude of the location.
        longitude - The longitude of the location.
        name - The event that is to be occurring that a locationbasednotification is being created for.
        description - The description of the event.
        radius - The radius associated with the event.
        Returns:
        The fragment to be initiated.

        Parameters:
        user - The user.
        Returns:
        The fragment to be initiated.
